channel.title: The Actual Problem with some aspects of the game
channel.description:
Let's talk about the knight....
The Knight is a **Blue Dragon Killer** therefore he belongs to the Blue Dragon faction BUT his job is to kill Blue Dragon. So when you see a knight random cs'ing n3 , don't mind them. They're just doing their job.
The Reaper/The Sorcerer/The Possessor is **Neutral Killer** therefore they belong to the Neutral faction. But why isn't their WC to kill all neutrals in the game??? Devs plz fix
The Prince is a **Blue Dragon Killer**. He executes BD only. If he executed evils , he dies. Pls do dis.
The Hunter is a **Blue Dragon Killer**. If he wolfs an evil , he dies. pls fix.
The Assassin is an **Unseen Killer**. If he kills a non-unseen member , he dies.
This is a better suggestion than fixing the filter system. ~~Altough I got phys 7 times in a row , devs plz fix~~
~~pls no ban~~
